pages-about_Description: Open source podcast player for iOS, Android, F-Droid and web. Podcasting 2.0 certified. Create and share podcast highlights. Sync your queue and history across all devices. pages-verify_email_Description: Verify your email address on Podverse
Password must contain: Password must contain a number, uppercase, lowercase, and be at least 8 characters long.
PleaseCheckInbox: Please check your inbox and verify your email to log in to your account. You may need to check your Spam or Promotions folder.
PleaseProvideValidEmail: Please provide a valid email address
PleaseVerifyEmail: Please verify your email address to log in.
Podcasts, clips, and playlists are visib: Podcasts, clips, and playlists are visible on your profile page
RatingsProvidedByPodcasters: Ratings are provided by the podcasters themselves,
RefreshToHideNSFW: Refresh your browser to hide NSFW content
RefreshToIncludeNSFW: Refresh your browser to include NSFW content
RequestAPodcastLine1: Can't find the podcast you're looking for?
RequestAPodcastLine2b: with the name of the show and we'll add it to Podcast Index and our database.
RequestAPodcastLine3: Note: please only request publicly available RSS feeds. We can't add private/paid/premium feeds.
Reset password email sent2: If you don't see it in your inbox, please check your Spam folder.
SearchError: Search failed. Please check your internet connection and try again later.
Something went wrong: Something went wrong. Please check your internet connection.
Success Redirecting to the home page: Success! Redirecting to the home page...
ThankYouForVerifying: Thank you for verifying! You should now be able to log in.
ThereAreNoItemsInYourQueue: There are no items in your queue.
This feature is only available for premi: This feature is only available for premium members. Log in for a free trial.
This will delete all of your Podverse da: This will delete all of your Podverse data!
Time must be in hhmmss format: Time must be in hh:mm:ss format
Title: Title
TrialEnded: Your free trial has ended. Please renew to continue using premium features.
Type a title for your playlist: Type a title for your playlist
Your profile page is hidden: Your profile page is hidden. Your Public clips are still accessible by anyone, and your Only with Link clips and playlists are still accessible to anyone with the URL.
YourMembershipHasExpired: Your premium membership has expired. Renew to continue using premium features.
